references.paper_title: Imagen video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational model for high-definition video generation using diffusion models, which the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Snap video: Scaled spatiotemporal transformers for text-to-video synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art architecture for video generation that is used as the basis for the current paper's approach.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper details a method for personalizing text-to-image models, which is highly relevant to the current paper's goal of personalizing video models.

references.paper_title: Dreambooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper presents a technique for personalizing text-to-image diffusion models, offering insights applicable to the personalization of video models.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a technique for efficiently adapting large language models that is used in the current paper for video model personalization.
